TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit UmAlQuraCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar

summary.span: 表示沙烏地阿拉伯回教 (Um Al Qura) 曆法。

span.span: Represents the Saudi Hijri (Um Al Qura) calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是幾乎等同類別中，但 Um Al Qura 曆法來計算日期，請可以使用以資料表為基礎的演算法，授權沙烏地 government express 1500 年紀元，日期，而不支援屬性。The class is nearly identical to the class, except the Um Al Qura calendar uses a table-based algorithm licensed from the Saudi government to calculate dates, can express dates to the year 1500 A.H., and does not support the property. > [!NOTE] > 如需有關使用資訊類別和其他的行事曆 .NET Framework 中的類別，請參閱 < [ 使用行事曆](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md)。For information about using the class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md). 針對類別，每個月有 29 或 30 天，但通常沒有顯著的順序。For the class, each month has either 29 or 30 days, but usually in no discernible order. 回曆的文件，可提供對應天會顯示每個月中的資料表，而沒有這類一般的資料表可以產生為 Um Al Qura 曆法。Whereas the documentation for the Hijri Calendar gives a table that shows the corresponding days in each month, no such general table can be produced for the Um Al Qura calendar. 如需回曆的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For more information about the Hijri calendar, see the class. **附註**類別只支援從 04/30/1900 00.00.00 （西曆日期） 到 11/16/2077年 23:59:59 （西曆日期）。**Note** The class supports only dates from 04/30/1900 00.00.00 (Gregorian date) through 11/16/2077 23:59:59 (Gregorian date).

span.span: Working with Calendars

related.span: 範例：行事曆週範圍公用程式

span.span: Sample: Calendar Week Range Utility

override this.AddMonths : DateTime * int -> DateTime

param.name: time
param.span: 要在其中加入月份的日期。

span.span: The date to which to add months.
The class supports only dates from 04/30/1900 00.00.00 (Gregorian date) through 11/16/2077 23:59:59 (Gregorian date).
The positive or negative number of months to add.

summary.span: 計算與指定初始日期相差指定月數的日期。

span.span: Calculates a date that is a specified number of months away from a specified initial date.

returns.span: 由 參數指定的月數加入至由 參數指定的日期所產生的日期。

span.span: The date yielded by adding the number of months specified by the parameter to the date specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生的日期部分產生的日期不在產生的月份，產生的 year 的有效日期會受到影響。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它會變更為產生的 year 之產生的月份中最後一個有效的日期。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 產生的年份部分產生的月份超出指定的年份會受到影響。The year part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified . 此實作會支援目前的紀元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果產生的 year 超出指定的紀元會擲回例外狀況。Therefore, an exception is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 產生的日期時間部分維持不變，與指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 比方說，如果指定的月份是 Zulkadah，有 30 天內，指定某一天是該月的第 30 天，而`months`參數為 3，則產生的 year 是個以上的指定年份中，產生的月份是 Safar，並產生 day 是 29 日，也就是 safar 的最後一天。For example, if the specified month is Zulkadah, which has 30 days, the specified day is the 30th day of that month, and the value of the `months` parameter is 3, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is Safar, and the resulting day is the 29th day, which is the last day in Safar. 如果值`months`參數是負值，產生早於指定。If the value of the `months` parameter is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 屬性傳回之值一律等於。The property of the returned value always equals . 您可以保留的屬性`time`藉由呼叫的參數方法，如下列範例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#5)] ## Examples 下列範例會具現化值，並顯示 Um Al Qura 曆法的數個元件的值。The following example instantiates a value and displays the values of several of its components in the Um Al Qura calendar. 接著，它會呼叫和2 年 10 月 Um Al Qura 曆法將日期值的方法。Next, it calls the and methods to add 2 years and 10 months in the Um Al Qura calendar to the date value. 最後，它也不會顯示這些日期元件的值在 Um Al Qura 曆法。Finally, it again displays the values of these date components in the Um Al Qura calendar. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.AddMonths#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.umalquracalendar.addmonths/cs/addmonths1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.AddMonths#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.umalquracalendar.addmonths/vb/addmonths1.vb#1)]

is less than -120,000 or greater than 120,000.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生的日期部分產生的日期不在產生的月份，產生的 year 的有效日期會受到影響。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它會變更為產生的 year 之產生的月份中最後一個有效的日期。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 產生的月份部分維持不變，與指定。The month part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 此實作會支援目前的紀元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果產生的 year 超出指定的紀元會擲回例外狀況。Therefore, an exception is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 產生的日期時間部分維持不變，與指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 比方說，Zulhijjah 有 29 天，除了有 30 天的潤年期間。For example, Zulhijjah has 29 days, except during leap years when it has 30 days. 如果指定的日期是閏年 Zulhijjah 的 30 天，而`years`參數是 1，則產生的日期是 Zulhijjah 29 日，在下一年度。If the specified date is the 30th day of Zulhijjah in a leap year and the value of the `years` parameter is 1, the resulting date is the 29th day of Zulhijjah in the following year. 如果`years`是負數，產生早於指定。If `years` is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 屬性傳回之值一律等於。The property of the returned value always equals . 您可以保留的屬性`time`藉由呼叫的參數方法，如下列範例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#8)] ## Examples 下列範例會具現化值，並顯示 Um AL Qura 曆法的數個元件的值。The following example instantiates a value and displays the values of several of its components in the Um AL Qura calendar. 接著，它會呼叫和2 年 10 月 Um Al Qura 曆法將日期值的方法。Next, it calls the and methods to add 2 years and 10 months in the Um Al Qura calendar to the date value. 最後，它也不會顯示這些日期元件的值在 Um Al Qura 曆法。Finally, it again displays the values of these date components in the Um Al Qura calendar. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.AddMonths#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.umalquracalendar.addmonths/cs/addmonths1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.AddMonths#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.umalquracalendar.addmonths/vb/addmonths1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 回曆會辨識一個紀元：紀元The Hijri calendar recognizes one era: A.H. (拉丁文"Anno Hegirae 」，這表示 「 年的移轉，」 參考移轉的 Muhammad (PBUH) 從一)。(Latin "Anno Hegirae", which means "the year of the migration," in reference to the migration of Muhammad (PBUH) from Mecca). 這個屬性一律傳回只有一個元素的陣列。This property always returns an array with only one element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值如下所示：The values are as follows: |DayOfWeek 值DayOfWeek value|這表示which indicates| |---------------------|---------------------| |星期日Sunday|الاحد (Al Ahad)الاحد (Al-Ahad)| |週一Monday|الاثنين (Al Ithnayn)الاثنين (Al-Ithnayn)| |星期二Tuesday|الثلاثاء (在 Thulaathaa')الثلاثاء (At-Thulaathaa')| |週三Wednesday|الاربعاء (Al-Arbi'aa')الاربعاء (Al-Arbi'aa')| |星期四Thursday|الخميس (Al Khamiis)الخميس (Al-Khamiis)| |週五Friday|الجمعة (Al Jumu'ah)الجمعة (Al-Jumu'ah)| |星期六Saturday|السبت (做為-Sabt)السبت (As-Sabt)| ## Examples 下列範例會顯示數個元件的值方面 Um Al Qura 曆法。The following example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Um Al Qura calendar. remarks.format: ## Remarks 年中的日被指從當年第一日的天數。The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year. 比方說，方法會傳回 1 的年度和總天數在上個月的最後一天的年份的第一個月的第一天。For example, the method returns 1 for the first day of the first month of the year, and the total number of days in the year for the last day of the last month. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示數個元件的值方面 Um Al Qura 曆法。The following example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Um Al Qura calendar. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.UmALQuraCalendar.AddMonths#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.umalquracalendar.addmonths/cs/addmonths1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.UmALQuraCalendar.AddMonths#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.umalquracalendar.addmonths/vb/addmonths1.vb#1)]

span.span: The return value is 29 in a common year and 30 in a leap year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回指定月份和閏年，一般年份中的不同的天數。This method returns a different number of days in a specified month for a common year versus a leap year. 比方說，這個方法傳回 29 或 30 Zulhijjah (`month` = 12)，這取決於是否`year`是否為閏年。For example, this method returns 29 or 30 for Zulhijjah (`month` = 12), depending on whether `year` is a leap year. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫方法來取得每個月的連續的五年的天數。The following example calls the method to get the number of days in each month of five consecutive years. remarks.format: ## Remarks Um Al Qura 曆法會辨識一個紀元：紀元The Um Al Qura calendar recognizes one era: A.H. (拉丁文"Anno Hegirae 」，這表示 「 年的移轉，」 參考移轉的 Muhammad (PBUH) 從一)。(Latin "Anno Hegirae", which means "the year of the migration," in reference to the migration of Muhammad (PBUH) from Mecca). ## Examples 下列範例會顯示在 Um Al Qura 曆法的日期的數個元件的值。The following example displays the values of several components of a date in the Um Al Qura calendar. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.AddMonths#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.umalquracalendar.addmonths/cs/addmonths1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.AddMonths#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.umalquracalendar.addmonths/vb/addmonths1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行事曆支援閏月的概念，在特定月份或任何一年中的月之後，可能會發生的閏月。In a calendar that supports the notion of a leap month, the leap month can occur either after a particular month or after any month in a year. 比方說，方法傳回的數字，介於 1 到 13，表示指定的日期與相關聯的月份。For example, the method returns a number between 1 and 13 that indicates the month associated with a specified date. 如果年份的第八個和第九個月之間沒有閏月方法會傳回 8，第八個月內，如呈獻第八個月的 9 和 10，第九個月。If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month.

span.span: is less than 1318 or greater than 1450.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法很有用，因為它可以將目前曆法中的任何日期轉換成的西曆日期。The method is useful because it can convert any date in the current calendar to a Gregorian calendar date. 為西曆日期，之後可用，比方說，來比較不同的行事曆中的日期，或在特定的行事曆中建立相等的日期。The Gregorian date can subsequently be used, for example, to compare dates in different calendars or create an equivalent date in a particular calendar.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int ToFourDigitYear (int year);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 ToFourDigitYear(int32 year) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToFourDigitYear (year As Integer) As Integer
public: override int ToFourDigitYear(int year);
override this.ToFourDigitYear : int -> int

param.name: year
param.span: 從 0 到 99 的 2 位數年份，或是從 1318 到 1450 的 4 位數 Um Al Qura 曆法年份。

span.span: A 2-digit year from 0 through 99, or a 4-digit Um Al Qura calendar year from 1318 through 1450.

summary.span: 將指定的年份轉換為 4 位數年份，方法是使用 屬性以判斷適當的世紀。

span.span: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year by using the property to determine the appropriate century.

returns.span: 如果 參數是 2 位數年份，則傳回值為對應的 4 位數年份。

span.span: If the parameter is a 2-digit year, the return value is the corresponding 4-digit year.

returns.span: 如果 參數是 4 位數年份，則傳回值會是未變更的 參數。

span.span: If the parameter is a 4-digit year, the return value is the unchanged parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用`year`參數，屬性，並計算 4 位數年份的一年。The method uses the `year` parameter, the property, and a year to calculate a 4-digit year. 世紀取決於尋找 2 位數的唯一相符項目`year`該 100 年範圍內的參數。The century is determined by finding the sole occurrence of the 2-digit `year` parameter within that 100-year range. 例如，如果設為 1429，100 年範圍是從透過 1429年 1330年。For example, if is set to 1429, the 100-year range is from 1330 through 1429. 因此，30 的 2 位數值會解譯為 1330 中,，而 2 位數為 29 值解譯為 1429年。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1330, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 1429. 如果屬性是特殊值 99方法會忽略區域中的設定和語言選項控制台 中，並傳回`year`未變更的參數。If the property is the special value 99, the method ignores the settings in the regional and language options in Control Panel and returns the `year` parameter unchanged. 支援的兩位數年份或四位數年份。 supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year. 傳遞的兩位數年份值 (小於 100) 會導致方法將值轉換為四位數字值，根據值，表示適當的世紀。Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the value representing the appropriate century. 如果應用程式提供支援的行事曆範圍內的四位數年份值，此方法會傳回實際的輸入的值。If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to , the method returns the actual input value. 應用程式提供四位數字值，超出支援的行事曆的範圍，則會提供為負數值，此方法會擲回例外狀況。If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.

exception.span: 在這個日曆所支援的範圍之外。

span.span: is outside the range supported by this calendar.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int TwoDigitYearMax { get; set; }
.property instance int32 TwoDigitYearMax
Public Overrides Property TwoDigitYearMax As Integer

member this.TwoDigitYearMax : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定以二位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍的最後一年。

span.span: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

value.span: 以二位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍的最後一年。

span.span: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性允許的 2 位數年份若要正確轉譯成 4 位數年份。This property allows a 2-digit year to be properly translated to a 4-digit year. 比方說，如果這個屬性設定為 1429年，100 年範圍是從透過 1429年 1330年。For example, if this property is set to 1429, the 100-year range is from 1330 through 1429. 因此，30 的 2 位數值會解譯為 1330 中,，而 2 位數為 29 值解譯為 1429年。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1330, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 1429. 這個屬性的初始值被衍生自 [控制台] 的 [地區及語言選項] 部分中的設定。The initial value of this property is derived from the settings in the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 不過，這項資訊可以變更的存留期間。However, that information can change during the life of the . 類別不會偵測系統設定 中的變更會自動。The class does not detect changes in the system settings automatically. 特殊值 99 原因方法來略過系統設定，並傳回指定的年份保持不變。The special value 99 causes the method to ignore the system settings and return the specified year unchanged.

exception.span: 這個曆法是唯讀的。

span.span: This calendar is read-only.

exception.span: 在設定作業中，Um Al Qura 曆法的年份值小於 1318 但不是 99，或大於 1450。

span.span: In a set operation, the Um Al Qura calendar year value is less than 1318 but not 99, or is greater than 1450.

Public Const UmAlQuraEra As Integer = 1
public: int UmAlQuraEra = 1;
val mutable UmAlQuraEra : int

summary.span: 代表目前的紀元。

span.span: Represents the current era.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值欄位為 1。The value of the field is 1. Um Al Qura 曆法會辨識一個紀元：紀元The Um Al Qura calendar recognizes one era: A.H. (拉丁文"Anno Hegirae 」，這表示 「 年的移轉，」 參考移轉的 Muhammad (PBUH) 從一)。(Latin "Anno Hegirae", which means "the year of the migration," in reference to the migration of Muhammad (PBUH) from Mecca).
